an3.17:4.1: “These three things, mendicants, lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, and hurting both.
an3.17:4.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.17:4.4: These are three things that lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, and hurting both.
an3.17:5.1: These three things, mendicants, don’t lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, or hurting both.
an3.17:5.3: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.17:5.4: These are three things that don’t lead to hurting yourself, hurting others, or hurting both.”
